messages.en: Ah, sure enough...

messages.zh: 鲍勃！你，你在流血！
messages.en: Bob! Y-you’re bleeding!

messages.zh: 我们不能在这里白白流血！我还能——
messages.en: We can't bleed in vain here! I can also -

messages.zh: 够了。
messages.en: Enough.
Bob...

messages.zh: 我们流过的血还少吗？
messages.en: Haven't we shed enough blood today?

messages.zh: 还要打吗？
messages.en: Do you still want to fight?

messages.zh: 哼，我们为了活命而战斗，为什么要在战斗中送命？
messages.en: Hpmh. We fight to stay alive. Why should we continue to waste our life in a losing battle?

messages.zh: 我不够强，我认命了。
messages.en: I'm not strong enough. I accept my fate.

messages.zh: 鲍勃，抱歉......没有这箱宝藏，我们的村子就完了。
messages.en: Bob, I'm sorry... Without this treasure, my village will be done for.

messages.zh: 离那箱东西远一点。把钥匙交给我。
messages.en: Stay away from the chest. And give me the key.

messages.zh: 呜，呜?
messages.en: *Whimpers*

messages.zh: 在你用那把钥匙打开宝箱的一瞬间，你会没命的。
messages.en: The moment you open the chest with that key, you will lose your life.

messages.zh: 这可是家里历代流传的贵重物品，
messages.en: This valuable key handed down for generation is important to my family.

messages.zh: 父亲说我们最重要的职责之一就是要负责保管这枚钥匙——
messages.en: My father always said that one of our most important duties was to take care of the key

messages.zh: ——钥匙使用后会割破你的手，吸走你的血。
messages.en: ——That key will cut your hand and suck on your blood.

messages.zh: 如果不是你这样的库兰塔人的血的话，钥匙就毁了。
messages.en: If you are not of Kuranta blood, the key will destroy itself.

messages.zh: 把钥匙给我！
messages.en: Give me the key!

messages.zh: 不行，这是村子里的所有人的未来。
messages.en: No, this is the future of everyone in my village.

messages.zh: 唔。
messages.en: Oh.

messages.zh: 这些都是真的吗，斯卡蒂？
messages.en: Is that all true, Skadi?

messages.zh: 藏匿了骑士宝藏的人，为了守护骑士的秘密，不择手段。只有——
messages.en: The people who hid the knights treasure are ruthless. They will do anything to protect the knights secret. Only——

messages.zh: ——只有来自卡西米尔的血脉才能破除所有的阻碍。
messages.en: ——only the blood of Kazimierz can overcome all obstacles.

messages.zh: “只有来自不惧牺牲，无畏艰险的卡西米尔血脉才能破除所有的阻碍。”
messages.en: “Only Kazimierz blood that is unafraid of sacrifice and danger can overcome all obstacles.”

messages.zh: 虽然也知道可能会要付出一些代价，但没有想到结果会是这样。
messages.en: I knew there would be a price to pay, but I didn't expect it to be so heavy.

messages.zh: 为了村子的所有人，我也早就做好觉悟了。我必须打开这个箱子！
messages.en: For the sake of everyone in my village, I have made up my mind on this. I must open this chest!

messages.zh: 格拉尼，如果我出了意外，请把这些宝藏换来的钱带回给村民们！
messages.en: Grani, if anything happens to me, please bring the treasure back to the villagers!

messages.zh: 对不起，父亲......
messages.en: I’m sorry, father...

messages.zh: 等等！
messages.en: Wait!

messages.zh: 诶？
messages.en: Yes?

messages.zh: 可萝尔。能把钥匙给我看看吗？
messages.en: Carol. Can I see the key, please?
I... Okay.

messages.zh: 这个钥匙也不是很大不是吗？
messages.en: Is it a big key?

messages.zh: 虽然它不大，但是它吸走的血液量，一般人恐怕撑不住——
messages.en: It's not big, but it can suck up a lot of blood than an average person could possibly withstand——

messages.zh: 所以，这个怪物钥匙，吸走的血是有限的吧？
messages.en: So there's a limit to the amount of blood this strange key can draw, right?

messages.zh: 可萝尔。
messages.en: Carol.

messages.zh: 我来打开箱子。
messages.en: I shall open the box.

messages.zh: 咦？可是这样一来，格拉尼你就。
messages.en: Eh? But this way, Grani you will ——

messages.zh: 没关系。
messages.en: It’s alright.

messages.zh: 抱歉了，可萝尔。
messages.en: I’m sorry, Carol.

messages.zh: 斯卡蒂啊，如果我晕过去了的话，请接住我的身体哦。
messages.en: Skadi, if I faint, please catch me.

messages.zh: 格拉尼你快住手！别这么做！
messages.en: Grani stop! Don't do it!
Urgh!!!

messages.zh: 格拉尼！
messages.en: Grani!!

messages.zh: 数日后
messages.en: A few days later

messages.zh: 晴 。 能见度 12公里
messages.en: Sunny \ Visibility 12 km

messages.zh: 赏金猎人营地外
messages.en: Outside the bounty hunter camp

messages.zh: ......你们是......你们竟然还敢回来！
messages.en: .... You... How dare you come back!

messages.zh: 集合！所有人都给我过来！
messages.en: Gather everyone! Get them all over here!

messages.zh: 真是麻烦，为什么我要来帮忙处理这些赏金猎人呢？
messages.en: What a nuisance. Why am I here to help you with these bounty hunters?

messages.zh: 没办法，既然你得到了钥匙，就要帮我做这件事情。
messages.en: It can't be helped, since you've got the key, you owe me one.

messages.zh: 其实之前只要有你在的，也就不用雇佣其他的人来帮助村子了不是吗。
messages.en: As long as you are here, I don’t need to hire anyone else to protect Carol's village.

messages.zh: 啧。明明不关我的事。
messages.en: Hmph. It's supposed to be none of my business.

messages.zh: 人数不少。才刚捡回一条命的你，能对付得过来吗？
messages.en: That's a lot of people. You just got your life back, think you can handle it?

messages.zh: 不是还有你在吗？
messages.en: Well, I got your help.

messages.zh: 动作快点。我赶着回罗德岛。
messages.en: Hurry up then. I want to get back to Rhode Island sooner.

messages.zh: 好啊，那么动手吧！
messages.en: Okay, let’s do it!

messages.zh: 可萝尔还在等我们呢！
messages.en: Carol is still waiting for us!

messages.zh: 抱歉，最后还是没能帮上忙——
messages.en: Sorry, I couldn't help you out in the end.

messages.zh: 没关系，村子里的人也害怕感染者......
messages.en: It’s alright. The villagers are still scared of the infected people.

messages.zh: 这些事情只有我们自己知道就好。
messages.en: Let’s keep this to ourselves.

messages.zh: 总之,谢谢你们。
messages.en: Regardless, thank you very much.

messages.zh: 谢谢你和格拉尼做这个决定......
messages.en: Thank you and Grani for making this decision.

messages.zh: 没关系！
messages.en: It’s okay!

messages.zh: 所以这个事情终于告一段落了吗，我要走了。
messages.en: So is this finally over? I'm leaving.

messages.zh: 诶，等等我！
messages.en: Hey! Wait for me!

messages.zh: 抱歉，可萝尔！我们先回村子吧，村子还有好多事情需要我帮忙......
messages.en: Sorry Carol! Let's get back to the village first. There's so much I can do for the village!

messages.zh: 嗯！
messages.en: Yeah!

messages.zh: 还有，鲍勃大叔，要保重身体！需要治疗的时候，记得来罗德岛！
messages.en: And, uncle Bob, please take care of yourself! If you ever need treatment, remember to come to Rhode Island!

messages.zh: 小个子，等等！
messages.en: Little kid, wait!

messages.zh: 这枚金币，接好了！
messages.en: Here's a gold coin. Catch!

messages.zh: 嘿！
messages.en: Haha! Thanks!

messages.zh: 我会好好珍惜这份纪念品的！
messages.en: I will cherish this souvenir!

messages.zh: 数月后
messages.en: A few months later.

messages.zh: 【大鲍勃的信件】
messages.en: Big Bob's letter

messages.zh: 敬启。
messages.en: Yours truly,

messages.zh: 我是鲍勃。
messages.en: I'm Big Bob.

messages.zh: 我正在哥伦比亚的一处偏僻的庄园里，给你写下这封信。
messages.en: I am writing this letter to you from a remote estate in Colombia.

messages.zh: 大家都过得很好。感染者的身份还是有些不便，但阳光下的生活，比想象中还要美好。
messages.en: Everyone is doing well. While the status as an infected people is still a little inconvenient, but life under the sunshine is even better than imagined.

messages.zh: 多亏那个叫可萝尔的小姑娘和格拉尼在修缮完村子后，决定把多余的宝藏都留给我，我才能够顺利给这批弟兄们安居。
messages.en: Thanks to those little girls, Carol, and Grani, who had been fixing up the village. They had decided to leave the surplus treasure to me, I was finally able to settle down with my companions.

messages.zh: 我们已经可以自给自足了，甚至还打算试种啤酒花。
messages.en: We are now self-sufficient and are even trying to grow hops.

messages.zh: 这多亏了滴水村的那笔宝藏。
messages.en: All thanks to that treasure in droplet village.

messages.zh: 那是一个有趣的故事，十分有趣。不是应该潦草地写在信里的故事。
messages.en: It's an interesting story, a very good one at that. Not the kind of story that should be scrawled in a letter.

messages.zh: 我稍微改变了一点想法。
messages.en: I changed my mind a little.

messages.zh: 而我知道，你很早就有了自己的想法，整合运动并不是感染者唯一的归宿。
messages.en: And I know that you have your own thoughts from the start. The fact that the reunion movement is not the only home for the infected.

messages.zh: 你一定可以做出你自己的选择。
messages.en: You can surely make your own choices.

messages.zh: 我很想念你，希望能在哥伦比亚见到你。
messages.en: I miss you so much and hope to see you in Colombia soon.

messages.zh: 鲍勃
messages.en: Bob

messages.zh: 致   泥岩
messages.en: To Mudstone

messages.zh: 那真是太好了。
messages.en: That’s really nice.
